text.config.aggregate-config.title: Aggregate options
text.config.aggregate-config.option.suff: Suffocation timer in ticks (1 second = 20 ticks)
text.config.aggregate-config.option.suga: Allow planting sugar cane on mud
text.config.aggregate-config.option.safe: Fire doesn't spread or destroy blocks
text.config.aggregate-config.option.leat: Leather can be crafted from wool
text.config.aggregate-config.option.infi: No cost penalty for repeat item repairs
text.config.aggregate-config.option.armo: Lily pads cannot hold heavily armoured players
Mud blocks cannot hold heavily armoured players
Moss carpets cannot hold heavily armoured players
Sand and gravel cannot hold heavily armoured players
text.config.aggregate-config.option.iceW: Walking on ice with heavy armour breaks it
text.config.aggregate-config.option.magm: Walking on magma with heavy armour breaks it
text.config.aggregate-config.option.mudB: Bone meal can be used on mud blocks
text.config.aggregate-config.option.clim: Players with heavy armour cannot climb
Angle of camera under which climbing is disabled
text.config.aggregate-config.option.disa: Attacks do not knock mobs and players away
text.config.aggregate-config.option.base: Multiplier to player movement speed base
text.config.aggregate-config.option.disa: Disallow players replacing source water with blocks.
Disallow players replacing flowing water with blocks.
Disallow players replacing source lava with blocks.
Disallow players replacing flowing lava with blocks.
text.config.aggregate-config.option.buck: Disallow pouring a bucket of fluid into a block of the same fluid.
text.config.aggregate-config.option.disa: Settings disabling fluid replacement affect non-player causes (falling blocks, etc.).
